roleset.name: work
roleset.note: FIELDWORK-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry work.01. Likely only LVC usage is truly eventive. (from fieldwork.01-n)

roles.note: Most roles will probably occur very infrequently. (from fieldwork.01-n)

example.name: Worker only, within LVC
example.text: As a medical technician without formal training in ethnology , Teng-1 's qualifications for PRO-1 doing fieldwork have been questioned by some.

example.name: With project, within LVC
example.text: Shirin is doing fieldwork on war-related mental illness and victims of chemical weapons
example.arg: on war-related mental illness and victims of chemical weapons.
